changeSet.author: jkondrat
changeSet.sql: UPDATE service_taxonomy st SET taxonomy_id = (SELECT id FROM taxonomy t WHERE taxonomy_id = (SELECT taxonomy_id FROM taxonomy WHERE id = st.taxonomy_id) AND t.provider_name = st.provider_name ORDER BY name LIMIT 1)

changeSet.author: jkondrat
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM taxonomy t USING taxonomy t2 WHERE t.name IS NULL AND t2.name IS NOT NULL AND t.taxonomy_id = t2.taxonomy_id AND t.provider_name = t2.provider_name;
